sentences.en: An edgy calm has now descended on the city.
sentences.cn: 平静终于降临在德黑兰的上空.

sentences.en: Any Idea why the guards seem so edgy?
sentences.cn: 知道为什么警卫看起来这么急躁 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do you feel edgy ( nervous ) irritable?
sentences.cn: 您感到急躁 ( 精神紧张 ) 易激动 吗 ?

sentences.en: Even at Vogue, the bible of edgy fashion , the pants raised eyebrows.
sentences.cn: 即便是在前卫时尚圣经的《Vogue》杂志上, 灯笼裤也不受待见.

sentences.en: EXAMPLE: The company's edgy advertisements were popular with young professional people in large cities.
sentences.cn: 公司的时尚广告受到大城市年青职业人士的喜爱.

sentences.en: He was edgy and irritable. It was conceivable that he could blow up.
sentences.cn: 他急躁易怒, 可以想到他是会发火的.

sentences.en: His friends and family all said he became less edgy, less angry.
sentences.cn: 小布什的朋友和家人都说,他变得不像以前那么急躁和易怒了.

sentences.en: She was nervous and edgy, still chain-smoking.
sentences.cn: 她紧张不安，还在一根接一根地抽着烟。

sentences.en: She's always been an edgy type of person.
sentences.cn: 她一向就是那种情绪紧张的人.

sentences.en: So that's why you've been edgy since this morning?
sentences.cn: 那就是你从今早开始就烦燥的原因?

sentences.en: The parents have been a bit edgy lately, waiting for their children's examination results.
sentences.cn: 她有两天没睡觉了,所以离她远一点,她情绪不太好.

sentences.en: The prints range from edgy to adorable, with skulls being the most common motif.
sentences.cn: 畴前卫的打印规模,可爱, 与颅骨是最多见的正题.

sentences.en: This versatile attitude mixes fun and irreverence with edgy style.
sentences.cn: 这种多变的风格包含了乐趣和桀骜的前卫风格.

words.tran_cn: 使锐利；将…开刃；给…加上边
急躁的；尖利的；刀口锐利的

trans.tran_cn: 锋利的，泼辣的，尖锐的，神经紧张的，易激动的，急躁的，（画）轮廓过于分明的
trans.tran_en: If someone is edgy, they are nervous and anxious, and seem likely to lose control of themselves
